name: GDPR-Extensions-com-Youtube-2ClickSolution
author: GDPR-extensions.com Team

sections.description:
The GDPR Youtube 2 Click Solution, brought to you by GDPR-Extensions.com, is a feature-rich solution designed to empower website owners in effectively managing YouTube videos and bolstering user privacy.

This program is free software; you can redistribute it and/or
modify it under the terms of the GNU General Public License
as published by the Free Software Foundation; either version 2
of the License, or (at your option) any later version.

This program is distributed in the hope that it will be useful,
but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of
MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. See the
GNU General Public License for more details.

You should have received a copy of the GNU General Public License
along with this program; if not, write to the Free Software
Foundation, GDPR., 51 Franklin Street, Fifth Floor, Boston, MA 02110-1301, USA.

Copyright 2005-2015 Automattic, GDPR.

Adding Content Elements

  1. Edit a page or post using the WordPress editor.
  2. Add a new block and search for “GDPR YouTube 2 Click Solution.”
  3. Configure the following field:
    • YouTube Video URL: Enter the URL of the YouTube video you want to embed.
      Example: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=your_video_id

Custom Sections

gdpr-extensions-com-tabmanager

GDPR Tab Manager is a companion feature that allows you to manage the style and text of the consent overlay for specific plugins.

  1. In the WordPress admin dashboard, locate and click on “GDPR Tab Manager” in the left-hand menu.
  2. Inside the “GDPR Tab Manager,” you will see a list of available plugins.
  3. Select the specific plugin from the list and update the style and text of the consent overlay.

gdpr-extensions-com-cookiewidget

A cookie widget is automatically created on the user side to manage GDPR consents.

Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ)

How do I configure the YouTube video URL?

A: To configure the YouTube video URL, follow these steps:
1. Edit a page or post using the WordPress editor.
2. Add a new block and search for “GDPR YouTube 2 Click Solution.”
3. Configure the “YouTube Video URL” field by entering the URL of the YouTube video you want to embed. Example: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=your_video_id.

Can I customize the consent overlay style and text?

A: Yes, if you have GDPR Tab Manager installed, you can customize the style and text of the consent overlay for specific plugins. Follow the steps mentioned in the “GDPR Tab Manager Integration” section.

Is there any automatic cookie widget created?

A: Yes, a cookie widget is automatically generated on the user side to manage GDPR consents.

Third-Party Service

The GDPR-Extensions-com-Youtube-2ClickSolution plugin enhances user privacy by providing a comprehensive solution for managing YouTube videos on WordPress websites. Leveraging the YouTube API( https://www.youtube.com/iframe_api ), the plugin facilitates the embedding of videos, and users should be mindful of YouTube’s Terms of Service( https://www.youtube.com/static?template=terms ) and Privacy Policy when utilizing this feature. Additionally, the plugin integrates with the GDPR Tab Manager for customizable consent overlays, and it automatically generates a cookie widget to manage GDPR consents on the user side. It’s crucial to note that the plugin relies on third-party services, including the YouTube API, and users are encouraged to review and comply with the terms and conditions outlined by both the plugin’s GNU General Public License and the associated third-party services.

Developer Notes

This plugin uses the ‘gdprextensioncomyt’ prefix for function names and database tables to ensure uniqueness and avoid conflicts with other plugins.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the GDPR-Extensions-com-Youtube-2ClickSolution folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
